snippet: The flooding after the storm had a special sting in Fair Bluff, N.C., which has tried with grit and heart to remake itself amid economic shifts....
abstract: Severe flood damage wrought by Hurricane Matthew in Fair Bluff, NC, imperils future of small town that has fought to reinvent itself in face of economic changes; town's high poverty rate and shrinking population will make recovery and reopening of damaged businesses all the more difficult.

byline.original: By JESS BIDGOOD and ALAN BLINDER
byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood reported from Fair Bluff, and Alan Blinder from Atlanta. Julie Hirschfeld Davis contributed reporting from Greensboro, N.C.

lead_paragraph: The flooding after the storm had a special sting in Fair Bluff, N.C., which has tried with grit and heart to remake itself amid economic shifts.

headline.main: Hurricane Plunges a North Carolina Town’s Future Into Doubt
headline.print_headline: Hurricane Plunges a Town’s Future Into Doubt
